attributes.title: Universe Is Not Obligated To Make Sense to Us!
attributes.description:
Summary of the Satsang delivered on 28th October 2019

MAHASADASHIVA HAS 25 FACES, 50 HANDS, 75 EYES. ALL THESE 25 DIMENSIONS ARE HAPPENING NOW WITHOUT TIME GAP. UNIVERSES ARE MANIFESTING, SUSTAINED FOR ZILLIONS OF YEARS, REJUVENATED, PULLED OUT OF DELUSION AND LIBERATED WITHOUT TIME GAP WITH THE PERIOD OF ZILLIONS OF YEARS. THESE TWO ARE IMPORTANT LINES:  WITHOUT TIME GAP WITH PERIOD OF ZILLIONS OF YEARS!UNIVERSE IS NOT OBLIGED TO MAKE SENSE TO THE UNIVERSE. DECLARE THIS TO PARAMASHIVA WITH YOUR SURRENDER AND INTEGRITY. REQUEST HIM TO MANIFEST IN YOU AND YOUR LIFE.
